CustomField.formula: IF(Contact_Name__c <> '', Contact_Name__c & BR() , '') & IF( Contact_Number__c <> '', Contact_Number__c & BR() , '') & IF( Shipping_Name__c <> '', Shipping_Name__c& BR(), '') & IF( Address__c <> '', Address__c& BR(), '')& IF( City__c <> '', City__c& BR(), '') & IF( State__c <> '' , State__c& BR(), '') & IF( Pincode__c <> '', Pincode__c& BR(), '') & IF( Country__c <> '', Country__c& BR(), '')
CustomField.label: Delivery
